episodes.title: The Cult Behind The Killer: The Andrea Yates Story | Official Trailer | ID
episodes.description:
When Andrea Yates drowned her five children in the family bathtub one June morning in 2001, the world was left shocked – what could make a young mother do something like that to her own children? In the wake of her confession, it was established Yates was suffering from postpartum depression and psychosis. But while understanding of her mental illness helped illuminate Andrea’s struggle prior to the incident, in the years following her case the reality has shown to be far more complex. Investigation Discovery’s three-part docuseries, THE CULT BEHIND THE KILLER: THE ANDREA YATES STORY will peel back the haunting layers of the cases’ complexities, exposing the sinister influence of a cult that twisted her sense of reality – with deadly consequences. THE CULT BEHIND THE KILLER: THE ANDREA YATES STORY will premiere Tuesday, January 6 from 8-11PM ET/PT on ID. Episodes will be available to stream on HBO Max.

episodes.title: Ruby & Jodi: A Cult of Sin and Influence | Panel Discussion | ID
episodes.description:
Amanda Montell, author of the book "Cultish" and host of the podcast "Sounds Like a Cult", dives into a story that’s as disturbing as it is revealing—about parenting, power, faith, mental health, and the cult-like dynamics that can flourish in plain sight. The panel discusses "Ruby & Jodi: A Cult of Sin and Influence", an upcoming ID documentary that unpacks the twisted relationship between Ruby Franke and Jodi Hildebrandt. 

Watch the premiere on September 1 at 9/8c on ID or stream or HBO Max. 

Moderator:  
● Amanda Montell, author of the book "Cultish" and host of the podcast "Sounds Like a Cult"  
 
Panelists:  
● Olivia Crist Grant and Lauren Andrade, Filmmakers of "Ruby & Jodi: A Cult of Sin and Influence"
● John Dehlin, host of "Mormon Stories" podcast  
● Fortesa Latifi, journalist and author of the upcoming book "Like, Follow, Subscribe"
